duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day operations, ensuring customer satisfaction and providing excellent customer service.
Manage inventory and sales, implementing retail loss prevention strategies.
Supervise and train staff, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Implement retail loss prevention strategies to reduce shrinkage and maintain a visually appealing store environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Retail, or related field
